mainText:
Thank you Apple for creating such magnificent products.
Once you go Mac you never go back.
Steve Jobs will be remembered, not for his amazing products, but for who 
he was.
I recently purchased my Mac Book Pro last April, and i must say i have 
been wanting it for as long as i can remember. It truly is an amazing 
laptop, but it's more. Thank you Apple for the IPod Touch, Ipad 2, 
MacBook Pro, IMAC and many more wonderful products.
Cheers!
author: Sophia
